title: GAIL, Petron sign pact to explore setting up bio-ethylene plant in India
description: GAIL (India) Ltd has partnered with US biofuel producer Petron Scientech Inc. to explore establishing a 500 kilo tonnes per annum bio-ethylene plant in India. The collaboration aims to enhance sustainable practices and advance the bio-economy, focusing on bioethanol. Both companies will conduct feasibility studies and seek investment approval for the project.
